markdownRemark.html:
le plus souvent, au cours de notre vie, nous pensons moins avec les mots que les mots et les concepts ne se pensent à travers nous.

— Martin Heidegger (attributed), Comment j'ai cessé d'être juif by Shlomo Sand

Most often in the course of our life we think less with words and concepts than they think themselves through us.

— Martin Heidegger (attributed), How I Stopped Being a Jew by Shlomo Sand and translated by David Fernbach

frontmatter.author: Martin Heidegger
frontmatter.title: Most often in the course of our life we think less with words and concepts than they think themselves through us.
